entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
